item.title: How do i make a object give exp
item.dc:creator: @Mc131313 Mc131313
item.description:
@Mc131313 wrote:

[code]case NUMBER OF OBJECT ID:
if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) {
if(actionTimer == 0)
{
sendMessage(“PUT THE TEXT YOU WANT IT TO SAY TO THAT PERSON WHEN THEY CLICK IT”);
addSkillXP((PUT THE AMOUNT OF XP GIVEN EACH TIME*playerLevel[1]), 1);
addSkillXP((SAME HERE ^^^*playerLevel[18]), 18);
actionTimer = 20;
setAnimation(HERE IS THE ANIMATION ID);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
break;

[/code]

You have to have done fedexers global making tut or you could have made it using a different tut.add this above or below any case in client.java .
